movie.title: Allied
movie.description_intro: At the height of World War II, in turbulent 1942, the fearless Wing Commander, Max Vatan, lands on the desert dunes of Morocco to meet with the Parisian member of the French Resistance, Marianne Beauséjour. After a botched attempt to eliminate an elusive target during a suicide mission in the heart of Casablanca, Max and Marianne flee to England intent on starting a family soon; however, heavy clouds of distrust and suspicion will burden their already difficult relationship, when Max receives a shocking call from the Secret Service Division. In disbelief--with a terrible task in his hands, and crushed under a devastating dilemma--Max must summon up the courage to seek for answers in the perilous streets of a bombarded London, regardless of the outcome. Now, amid duty and love, who shall live and who shall die?
movie.description_full: At the height of World War II, in turbulent 1942, the fearless Wing Commander, Max Vatan, lands on the desert dunes of Morocco to meet with the Parisian member of the French Resistance, Marianne Beauséjour. In disbelief--with a terrible task in his hands, and crushed under a devastating dilemma--Max must summon up the courage to seek for answers in the perilous streets of a bombarded London, regardless of the outcome. Now, amid duty and love, who shall live and who shall die?

movies.title: Morning Show Mysteries Morning Show Mystery: Murder on the Menu
movies.title_english: Morning Show Mysteries Morning Show Mystery: Murder on the Menu
movies.title_long: Morning Show Mysteries Morning Show Mystery: Murder on the Menu (2018)
movies.summary: When a dead body turns up in the car of one of her guests, a temperamental celebrity chef, Billie Blessings is on the case again.
movies.description_full: When a dead body turns up in the car of one of her guests, a temperamental celebrity chef, Billie Blessings is on the case again.
movies.synopsis: When a dead body turns up in the car of one of her guests, a temperamental celebrity chef, Billie Blessings is on the case again.

movies.title: The Wilde Wedding
movies.summary: A retired film star's wedding to her fourth husband brings chaos when their families (and her ex-husband) show up for the festivities.
movies.description_full: A retired film star's wedding to her fourth husband brings chaos when their families (and her ex-husband) show up for the festivities.
movies.synopsis: A retired film star's wedding to her fourth husband brings chaos when their families (and her ex-husband) show up for the festivities.

movies.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
movies.summary: The sequel to 2005's "Madagascar", in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

movies.title: Manchester by the Sea
movies.summary: Lee Chandler is a brooding, irritable loner who works as a handyman for a Boston apartment block. One damp winter day he gets a call summoning him to his hometown, north of the city. His brother's heart has given out suddenly, and he's been named guardian to his 16-year-old nephew. As if losing his only sibling and doubts about raising a teenager weren't enough, his return to the past re-opens an unspeakable tragedy.
